detectors.description:
Reentrancy in GrowthLockContract.payToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GrowthLockContract.sol#88-103):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(token.transfer(dev,devAmount) == true,You don't have enough in balance. ) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GrowthLockContract.sol#94)
	- require(bool,string)(token.transfer(safe,managementAmount) == true,You don't have enough in balance. ) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GrowthLockContract.sol#97)
	- require(bool,string)(token.transfer(mike,managementAmount) == true,You don't have enough in balance. ) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GrowthLockContract.sol#98)
	- require(bool,string)(token.transfer(ghost,managementAmount) == true,You don't have enough in balance. ) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GrowthLockContract.sol#99)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- time += locktime (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GrowthLockContract.sol#101)

detectors.description:
GrowthLockContract.payToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GrowthLockContract.sol#88-103) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= (time + locktime),Period not reached yet. ) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GrowthLockContract.sol#90)
